chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has an issue:
I should have received it today, and I've tried several times to talk to Ups, but I can't get them to tell me the delivery date, which is Tuesday, April 4th. I'm heading to England on that day and I need my phone.
When contacting them, they tell me that the address they had was incomplete, and after looking at it, I've seen that it's correct.
My question is whether if I don't receive it by Monday, I'll have to file a complaint with PayPal for not receiving the package.
I'm waiting for help in finding a solution.

Thanks,

Dear ecomobile,

I am Valentina from Back Market.

A cordial greeting to you. I hope that you're having a good day. 

The customer cannot contact the carrier and the shipping is having issues with the delivery. Could you help us?

Thank you for understanding and have a nice day!

Regards,
Valentina, Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

Please send us the updated address of the customer in the following format:

NAME
ADDRESS
POST CODE
TOWN/STREET NAME
COUNTRY
PHONE NUMBER

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile,

I am Valentina from Back Market.

There are the customer data.

Name: Maria Jesus Ebri Chavarria
Address: Plaça de la Pau, MERCAT PUBLIC, parad 66, Risa Querol Fruits
Tortosa, Tarragona 43500
Country: Spain
Phone number: ‪607826106‬

Thank you for your help.

Regards,
Valentina, Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the updated address. We have contacted our logistics partner about the change of address.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

I am Valentina from Back Market. 

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customer's ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents.

If at any point the delivery begins to move again, a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Thank you for understanding and have a nice day!

Regards,
Valentina, Back Market Customer Care.

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our ogistics partner regarding the issue and will update you accordingly. In the meantime, please request the customer to provide a handwritten CND with IMEI and pictures of their ID

Regards,
JH

Hi!


The package hasn't been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost package policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been provided by the customer and shared in this conversation.

You can use the documents in the details to look into the matter with your delivery company

We will allow 5 business days for you to complete the investigation with the shipping provider. After that, unless a fraud is detected, this order will be refunded.
This order will be refunded within 1 business day. 

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Edison, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have received the documents that you have provided. However, we require a HANDWRITTEN CND with IMEI, instead of a softcopy. Please provide us with the necessary documents.

Regards,
TB

Dear ecomobile

Document asked attached.

Regards,
Edison from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the parcel is lost during delivery. Hence, we processed the refund. Sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Regards, 
KW
